title: 97. Lying to Ourselves
description: We rely on polls and surveys to tell us how people will behave in the future. Too bad they're completely unreliable.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
content:encoded: We rely on polls and surveys to tell us how people will behave in the future. Too bad they're completely unreliable.
